ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: On top of not being altogether displeased with the class - it is rated moderate to difficult btw to play a wiz we do get the most potential damage from casting
ygData.messageBody:
On top of not being altogether displeased with the class - it is rated moderate to difficult
btw to play a wiz we do get the most potential damage from casting and I have killed in duels players 2 levels up on me - enstill does not seem to me to be any better than root
however force shock is better direct damage than the level 24 ice shock spell but force shock requires a recovery period as ice does not that is the advantage also ice uses less
mana - also does a little less damage - and so far seems to me as my levels rise that spells
get resisted less and less - at 24 now force shock is resisted much less than it used to be
and root has become resonably reliable - enstill still seems to use too much mana for its
reliability imho.

Also as a former fellow wizard mentioned aside from being the most magically damaging
class < potentially we get travel as druids do but to the best of my knowledge we are the
only ones who can alter planes with a spell -- >

Research topics - cant seem to locate some cruicial runes for level 20 and 24 area effects
if any one has any to spare or would care to sell me the spells search me out.

Xzar Icewind - < Dragon's Claw > of Xegony
